entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Type binding Error with .NET 9 Preview 6 #23551
    9.0-preview7
  • Can not launch app after adding Entitlements.plist for MacCataylst #23548
  • UnauthorizedAccessExceptions are getting raised when building a blank MAUI app when using .NET 9.0 #23546
  • Adding aps-environment on Entitlement.plist causes Provisioning profile issues #23542
  • CarouselView ItemsSource not updated when triggered via button click #23538
    Backlog
  • [Memory leak] Critical MAUI memory leak in transient views #23537
  • ArgumentException in Preferences.Get #23536
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use private fields and properties in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23535
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use private types in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23534
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Binding SG] BindingSourceGen generates invalid code when referencing fields generated by XamlG #23531
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [MAUI]I7_PullToRefresh-Pulling down to refresh using refreshview for Horizontal grid doesn't work. #23529
    .NET 8 SR8
  • [Unstable][MAUI]I9_Scrolling_SnapPoints page throws System.ObjectDisposedException after setting SnapPointsType. #23528
    Backlog
  • cannot disable animation when navigate back #23524
  • [Properties > Build Actions] options available depend on order of TargetFrameworks in .csproj - Cannot see all options at once - Only the first OS's options are shown #23523
  • Hot Reload - Changes not supported #23521

Closed

  • Scrollview iOS - size out of bounds, sizing does not work. #23530
  • CarouselView Position-- not working on Windows #23533
  • CarouselView not getting displayed properly with ContentPresenter and ContentView #23539
  • Memory leaks when replacing Application.Current.MainPage by a new one keep the old page in memory #23034
  • Debug app crashes on iPhone 8 when running it directly, not debugging it. #23499
  • Sqlite Upgradation loss the DB while migrating from .Net7 to .Net8 MAUI only for Android #23525
  • [MAUI][.NET9] Clicking on any recipe page shows blank #21032
  • Assets file '... QueryEngine\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net7.0'. #23368
  • Carousel on MAUI .NET Application Not working. #23020
  • [Only Windows] InputTransparent=True makes view transparent #23436
    Backlog
  • Calling Focus() on an Entry befor it has been displayed causes ClearButton to be displayed permanently #23112
    Backlog
  • unable to debug android apps on Linux #23472
  • Support navigating to a new shell via NavigationPage #23356

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove mobile test from running on desktop #23550
  • [Windows] Fix pull to refresh w/ horz item layouts #23547
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-general
  • [net9.0] Update to preview7 versions #23544
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix the batch file for running local dotnet on windows #23541
  • [windows] fix memory leak in WebView #23540
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • [net9.0] Revert "Revert "Internalize MessagingCenter (#12582)"" #23527
  • [Windows] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #23526

Merged

  • [windows] fix VisualDiagnosticsOverlay keeping Page's alive #23489
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • [net9.0] Update versions preview6 (#23520) #23532
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Update versions preview6 public #23520
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • [Android] [iOS] [macOS] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area-controls-scrollview
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23513
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
